files.description: Defines an automation workflow to generate outputs/coverage_matrix.csv, outputs/eval_loop.md, and update outputs/index.md and outputs/manifest.json to link them.
Provides the initial coverage matrix with stable ontology columns (domain, subtopic, artifact_types, status, cycle_target, links) and an initial row set for tracking work across cycles.
Specifies the per-cycle evaluation and shipping loop with explicit shipping rules and acceptance criteria for each cycle.
Acts as a human-readable outputs landing page that links to the coverage matrix and eval loop documentation.
Records a machine-readable manifest of output artifacts including metadata and links to coverage_matrix.csv and eval_loop.md.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/coverage_matrix.csv with stable ontology columns (domain, subtopic, artifact types, status, cycle target, links) and an initial row set; create /outputs/eval_loop.md specifying per-cycle shipping rules and acceptance criteria; then link both from /outputs/index.md and /outputs/manifest.json.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Creates the operational control surfaces for alignment: coverage_matrix.csv provides a stable ontology and per-topic tracking, while eval_loop.md defines per-cycle shipping rules. Together they enable...
projectName: /outputs/coverage_matrix.csv with stable ontology columns (domain, subtopic, artifact types, status, cycle target, links) and an initial row set; create /outputs/eval_loop.md specifying per-cycle shipping rules and acceptance criteria; then link both from /outputs/index.md and /outputs/manifest.json.
